TextView.android:text: Hi! I am a Software Engineer focused on creating accessible, intuitive, beautiful apps. As a lifelong creative my first professional pursuit was in music, where I was fortunate to study with some of the world's most renowned artists and perform in major venues across the country. Having achieved my goals in the industry, I have turned my attention to software development, where I can use my skills as a creative thinker to build new and engaging user experiences. During my musical training I developed strong proficiencies in problem solving, organization, autonomy, iteration, and critical thinking, all of which I have found to be of great value as a solution-oriented developer. I enjoy building and creating things, and especially tackling problems and finding solutions to user needs. I enjoy collaborating with others and have extensive experience working in teams and pair-coding.
